title: Message to President Paul Doumer of France on Bastille Day.
text:
ON THIS national holiday of the French Republic it is a great pleasure to extend to Your Excellency and to your fellow countrymen sincere congratulations both in my own name and in the name of the people of the United States.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Paul Doumer, President of the French Republic, Paris, France]
